content.author: alphaleadership

acceptanceCriteria: The 'n challenge' request for YouTube video 'Bk78zF6R-OY' is successfully solved by yt-dlp using the 'bun' provider.
No 'RangeError: Out of memory' occurs during the processing of YouTube player JavaScript when solving challenges.
All available video formats for 'Bk78zF6R-OY' can be listed and downloaded after successfully solving the 'n challenge'.

details: Exact version of yt-dlp being used.
Exact version of the 'bun' runtime environment.
Operating system details and available RAM/memory of the execution environment where the 'Out of memory' error occurred.
The full command used to invoke yt-dlp that triggered this error.
Output of `yt-dlp --verbose` for the problematic video/command.
Confirmation of whether 'bun' is correctly installed and configured as an external dependency for yt-dlp's EJS (External JavaScript Solver).
